subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: While golfers are waxing nostalgic this week about the thrill of returning to the “home of golf” at St. Andrews, the home of the Open is actually here on the other side of Scotland, on the west coast.
snippet: While golfers are waxing nostalgic this week about the thrill of returning to the “home of golf” at St. Andrews, the home of the Open is actually here on the other side of Scotland, on the west coast.
